title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 502.2 - Maintenance of utility-owned service pipe
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 502.2 - Maintenance of utility-owned service pipe

State Regulations

Such rules and regulations shall in no event require the
consumer to maintain any service pipe owned by the water-works
corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
502.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
